title: After Marrying My Childhood Friend Who Was Supposed To Hate Me for Being a Gloomy Person, It Turns Out That She Actually Loves Me Very Much. She’s a Cool Takane No Hana on the Outside, but She’s Completely in Love With Me.the Girls Are Curious to Talk to Me, but Sorry, I’m Already Married - Novel Updates
tags: Arranged Marriage   Beautiful Female Lead   Childhood Friends   Dense Protagonist   Emotionally Weak Protagonist   Kuudere   Male Protagonist   Modern Day
author: Ibarakino   茨木野
description:
I’m a loner in my class, but I have a childhood friend, 【Rin Komoro】, who is known as the most beautiful girl in our school. 

In the spring of my third year of high school, I suddenly found out that I was going to marry Rin.

I heard that our grandfathers were very close to each other and had made an arrangement to get their grandchildren married to each other…

No, wait a minute! Doesn’t Rin hate me too much!?

She’s always glaring at me whenever I look at her… I’m not sure she’s happy about this marriage happening…

But in fact, Rin has been in love with me ever since she was a child.

Rin, who’s usually cool and reserved on the outside, is suddenly extremely sweet in front of me.

I was puzzled by her unexpected side, but I started …>
